data.text: Jehova Nyasaye ok mor gi rapim ma ok nikare,
Ka sunga biro, eka wichkuot bende biro,
Bidhruok mar joma kare telonegi,
Mwandu onge gi ohala e ndalo mar mirima,
Tim makare mar joma kare maonge ketho loso yoregi moriere,
Tim makare mar joma kare resogi,
Ka jaricho otho, to genone duto tho kode,
Ngʼat makare ireso kuom chandruok,
Ngʼat ma ok ja-Nyasaye hinyo jabathe gi dhoge owuon,
Ka ngʼat makare mewo, dala maduongʼ bedo mamor,
Gweth mar joma kare kelo pak ne dala,
Ngʼat maonge gi rieko jaro jabathe,
Kuoth ketho genruok,
Oganda podho nimar onge puonj,
Ngʼat machungʼ e gowi ni ngʼat mokia biro hinyore adier,
Dhako ma chunye ngʼwon yudo luor,
Ngʼat mangʼwon yudo ohala mana ne en owuon,
Jaricho yudo ohala mar miriambo,
Ngʼat man-gi tim makare kendo ma ja-adiera nobed mangima,
Jehova Nyasaye odagi jogo ma chunygi opongʼ gi richo,
Bed ka ingʼeyo ni jaricho ok notony ma ok okume,
Mana ka tere mar dhahabu manie um anguro,
Dwaro mar joma kare gik mana e ber kende,
Ngʼato achiel miyo ji ma ok odewo,
Ngʼat mangʼwon biro bedo gi mwandu;
Ji kwongʼo ngʼat mapando cham,
Ngʼat madwaro ber winjo maber,
Ngʼatno mogeno kuom mwandune biro podho;
Ngʼatno makelo chandruok ni joge ok nonwangʼ gimoro,
Olemb joma kare en yadh ngima,
Ka joma kare yudo pokgi e piny,
